entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
